abstract: Lawyers for Ahmed Mohamed, 14-year-old Muslim student arrested after taking homemade clock to his Dallas-area school, demand $15 million in damages and threaten lawsuit against City of Irving and its school district.
lead_paragraph: Lawyers for the 14-year-old Muslim boy who was arrested after taking a homemade clock to his Dallas-area school say he was publicly mistreated and deserves $15 million.

headline.main: Texas: $15 Million Sought for Boy Arrested for Clock
headline.print_headline: Texas: $15 Million Sought for Boy Arrested for Clock

snippet: Lawyers for the 14-year-old Muslim boy who was arrested after taking a homemade clock to his Dallas-area school say he was publicly mistreated and deserves $15 million.
